dashboard.noActiveGoals: You don't have active goals yet
dashboard.todayReminder: Today I choose to remember that:

plan.title: My Plan
plan.description: Create and manage your personalized recovery plan
plan.linkHint: The goal name will be clickable if you add a link
plan.resetButton: Reload all default goals from the beginning
plan.resetConfirmDescription: This action will delete all your current goals and completions, and replace them with the default goals. Your abstinence start date will also be reset to today. This action cannot be undone.
plan.resetSuccessDescription: Default goals have been loaded and your abstinence date has been reset.

progress.title: Progress
progress.deleteReportDescription: This action will permanently delete the progress report. This action cannot be undone.
progress.reportGeneratedSuccess: Your progress report has been generated successfully
progress.reportDeletedSuccess: The report has been deleted successfully
progress.loginRequiredReport: You must be logged in to generate a report
progress.limitExceededDescription: You have reached the request limit. Please try later.
progress.paymentRequiredDescription: Funds need to be added to your Lovable AI account.
progress.emailSentSuccess: The report has been sent to

journal.title: Journal
journal.speakNow: Speak now to create an automatic entry
journal.voiceCreated: Your audio has been transcribed and saved as a new entry
journal.loginRequired: You must sign in to save entries
journal.demoLoaded: 9 demo entries have been added to your journal

emotionJournal.title: Emotion Journal
emotionJournal.noEntries: You don't have emotional entries yet
emotionJournal.wasTriggeredBy: Was it triggered by a situation?
emotionJournal.selectAtLeastOne: Select at least one primary emotion
emotionJournal.noEmotionData: No emotion data for this period

gratitude.title: Gratitude
gratitude.whatAreYouGratefulFor: What are you grateful for today?
gratitude.noEntries: You don't have gratitude entries yet
gratitude.noEntriesForDate: No entries for the selected date
gratitude.noEntriesForToday: You haven't added anything to today's list yet
gratitude.entrySaved: Your gratitude entry has been saved
gratitude.loginRequired: You must sign in to save entries
gratitude.scienceBacked: The practice of gratitude has scientifically proven benefits
gratitude.benefit1: Improves emotional well-being and reduces depression
gratitude.benefit3: Increases resilience and ability to face challenges
gratitude.benefit4: Improves sleep quality and physical health
gratitude.practice1: Write 3 things you're grateful for each day
gratitude.practice2: Be specific: instead of "my family", write "my mother's supportive call today"
gratitude.practice3: Vary your gratitudes: look for new things each day
gratitude.practice4: Go deeper: explain why you're grateful for that
gratitude.practice5: Make it a habit: choose a specific time of day
gratitude.consistencyText: Studies show that practicing gratitude for 21 consecutive days can create lasting changes in your outlook and mental well-being.

checkIn.title: Daily Check-in
checkIn.question1: Did I stay clean from use today?
checkIn.question2: Did I encounter any situation that upset me today?
checkIn.question3: Today the most important thing to remember is:
checkIn.question5: Was I in touch with my feelings today?
checkIn.question7: Did I follow my daily values?
checkIn.question8: Have you done something that you think limits you instead of expanding you?
checkIn.question9: Have you had negative thoughts today?
checkIn.question10: Did you go to bed yesterday with the house tidy?
checkIn.question11: How would you rate your rest last night?
checkIn.question12: Have you eaten well in quantity and quality?
checkIn.question13: Do you think you moved enough?
checkIn.question14: How many glasses of water did you drink throughout the day?
checkIn.helpText: Daily check-ins help you maintain awareness of your emotional state and identify patterns in your recovery journey. All text responses will create a new entry in your journal.
checkIn.triggerPlaceholder: Tell your version of events without judging and how and where you felt it.
checkIn.triggerHelp: This description will be automatically saved as an entry in your journal with the title "Emotional Triggers"
checkIn.resentmentPlaceholder: What situation or person caused this resentment? How did it affect you?
checkIn.resentmentHelp: This description will be automatically saved as an entry in your journal with the title "Resentments"
checkIn.valuesPlaceholder: Which value you were unfaithful to. How and why you were unfaithful. How you can make amends.
checkIn.valuesHelp: This description will be automatically saved as an entry in your journal with the title "When I am unfaithful to my values"
checkIn.limitingLabel: What obstacles need to be overcome?
checkIn.limitingPlaceholder: Describe concretely the obstacles to overcome
checkIn.negativeThoughtsPlaceholder: What negative thoughts did you have today?
checkIn.relapseDescription: Relapses are part of the process. What's important is to learn from them.
checkIn.relapseAddictionLabel: Which addiction did you relapse on?
checkIn.counterResetDescription: This addiction's counter has been updated
checkIn.checkInSavedSuccess: Your daily progress has been successfully recorded
checkIn.loginRequiredError: You must be logged in to save the check-in
checkIn.defaultPlaceholder: The best is yet to come

tour.welcome: Welcome! 👋 I'll show you the main features of the app. You can access the menu from the ☰ button in the top left corner.
tour.cleanTime: 🫀 Here you'll see your clean time and manage your addictions.
tour.dailyProgress: 📊 Your Daily Progress: check-ins, completed goals and reminders.
tour.goals: 🎯 Today's Goals: mark your daily objectives as completed.
tour.quickTools: 🛠️ Quick Access: quickly access your favorite tools.
tour.menu: 💡 Use the ☰ menu to explore all sections: Journal, Chat, Community, Tools and more.
tour.center: 🫀 Your Center: Here you'll find your daily summary, check-ins and main stats.
tour.planDesc: 🎯 My Plan: Create and manage your personalized recovery plan.
tour.progressDesc: 📈 Progress: Visualize your evolution and achievements over time.
tour.emotionJournalDesc: 😊 Emotion Journal: Record how you feel each day.
tour.journalDesc: 📔 Journal: Freely write your thoughts and reflections.
tour.valuesDesc: ❤️ Values: Define and connect with your core values.
tour.chatDesc: 💬 Chat: Talk with your AI assistant and the community.
tour.communityDesc: 🫶 Community: Connect with others in recovery, share and find support.
tour.toolsDesc: 🛠️ Tools: Access useful resources for your recovery.
tour.helpDesc: 🆘 Help: Find immediate help when you need it.
tour.settingsDesc: ⚙️ Settings: Customize your experience and preferences.

landing.subtitle: A complete tool to support your process

reflections.1: Today I choose to move away from what harms me and towards what heals me
reflections.2: My past does not define my future
reflections.3: Every day I stay clean is a victory
reflections.4: I have the power to choose my path
reflections.6: I am stronger than I think
reflections.7: I deserve a full and healthy life
reflections.8: Progress, not perfection, is my goal
